nodes.text: The Kishh'tih airspeeder was a model of civilian airspeeder manufactured by Bakur RepulsorCorp. At six meters long, it seated four people, had a cargo capacity of 100 kilograms, could reach altitudes of up to 100 meters and could achieve speeds as fast as 360 kilometers an hour.

The Kishh'tih was a small, cheap, underpowered yet reliable airspeeder. It was designed mainly for joyriding in fair weather and had no weapons systems or armor plating. Shortly after the Battle of Endor, Han Solo and Princess Leia stole this model of airspeeder after having escaped from Governor Nereus's private mountain retreat near Salis D'aar on Bakura.
